Name and Photo Wishes

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.namewishes.andapp

Name Wishes is a free app which helps you to birthday cakes with name and photo, birthday wishes with name and photo, anniversary wishes with name, wedding wishes with name, engagement wishes with name and many more including good morning, good evening, good night, baby born wishes, good luck wishes.

You can also generate name and add photo on quotes including missing you quotes, i love you quotes, friendship quotes, apologize quotes and many more.

Write name on every global holidays and event wishes to wish your dear ones in a creative way on any event.

The purpose of this application is to provide a platform where anyone can write anyone's name as well as add photo on all kind of wishes without any skills. We are trying to change the way to wish online from boring wishes to interesting valuable wishes.

So make the best use of this app and give a heart touching feelings to your beloved ones. For more information about this app please feel easy to contact us.
